text: <@U01FH92LP6W> Looking for optimization strategies relating specifically to fixing the froms/v2.js render blocking.

To determine this, I like to look at the page's target keyword, then go to search and see what content length google is recommended for top 3 results, and then set content length. In general, you should have your content as short as possible and long as necessary. Automatic tools for this aren't often correct.
